long_description: Train in color and comfort with the Yurbuds Inspire earphones for women. These earphones are designed to fit smaller ears and take your listening experience to the next level with a secure fit. Patented twist-lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs flexible silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing on sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Durable, sweatproof and water-resistant earphones deliver reliable performance in almost any conditions. Angled plug relieves strain on the wire. Yurbuds Inspire earphones are compatible with your iPod, iPad and iPhone, and come with a zippered soft case.
short_description: Train in color and comfort with the Yurbuds Inspire earphones for women. These earphones are designed to fit smaller ears and take your listening experience to the next level with a secure fit.
